Package hw1

Class CameraBattery

java.lang.Object
hw1.CameraBattery
public class CameraBattery extends Object
A class representation of a removable and rechargeable camera battery
Author:
Ian Nelson

  • Constructor Details

    • CameraBattery

      public CameraBattery(double batterySartingCharge, double batteryCapacity)
      Constructs a new battery simulation disconnected from the camera and the external charger
      Parameters:
      batterySartingCharge - - initial battery charge
      batteryCapacity - - max battery capacity

  • Method Details

    • buttonPress

      public void buttonPress()
      indicates the user has pressed the setting button one time on the external charger. The charge setting increments by one or if already at the maximum setting wraps around to setting 0.

    • cameraCharge

      public double cameraCharge(double minutes)
      Charges the battery when connected to the camera for a given amount of time at a constant rate, Charge cannot exceed the battery capacity.
      Parameters:
      minutes - - given time to charge in minutes
      Returns:
      the actual amount the battery charged

    • externalCharge

      public double externalCharge(double minutes)
      Charges the battery connected to the external charger, if connected, for a given number of minutes. the formula is minutes * CHARGE_RATE * charger setting
      Parameters:
      minutes - - given time to charge in minutes
      Returns:
      the actual amount charged

    • drain

      public double drain(double minutes)
      Drains the battery connected to the camera, if connected, for given number of minutes. The drain cannot exceed the the current battery charge
      Parameters:
      minutes - - given time to charge in minutes
      Returns:
      the actual amount drained

    • resetBatteryMonitor

      public void resetBatteryMonitor()
      Reset the battery monitoring system by setting the total battery drain count back to 0.

    • getBatteryCapacity

      public double getBatteryCapacity()
      Get the battery's capacity.
      Returns:
      the battery's capacity

    • getBatteryCharge

      public double getBatteryCharge()
      Get the battery's current charge.
      Returns:
      the battery's current charge

    • getCameraCharge

      public double getCameraCharge()
      Get the current charge of the camera's battery.
      Returns:
      the battery's charge if it's connected to the camera, inCamera = 1

    • getCameraPowerConsumption

      public double getCameraPowerConsumption()
      Get the current power consumption of the camera
      Returns:
      the current power Consumption

    • getChargerSetting

      public int getChargerSetting()
      Get the external charger setting
      Returns:
      the current charger setting

    • getTotalDrain

      public double getTotalDrain()
      Get the total amount of power drained from the battery since the last time the battery monitor was started or reset.
      Returns:
      total drain since last reset

    • moveBatteryExternal

      public void moveBatteryExternal()
      Move the battery to the external charger. Updates the variables inCamera and inExternal

    • moveBatteryCamera

      public void moveBatteryCamera()
      Move the battery to the camera. Updates the variables inCamera and inExternal

    • removeBattery

      public void removeBattery()
      Remove the battery from either the camera or external charger. Updates the variables inCamera and inExternal

    • setCameraPowerConsumption

      public void setCameraPowerConsumption(double cameraPowerConsumption)
      Set the power consumption of the camera.
      Parameters:
      cameraPowerConsumption - - the given new power consumption
